title: Bug 17289: Inability to Focus on Combo by Clicking (Photon)
description: Clicking on the first Combo does not focus on it.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not trigger focus.
EB: Upon clicking the first Combo, the focus caret should be placed in the field labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
1. Open the interface containing the Combo elements.
2. Attempt to click on the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
3. Observe that the focus is not directed to the 'Host:' field.
